title: New Thirstype Site
content:
[http://thirstype.com/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111093212/http:/thirstype.com/index.php)   
   
It kicks T26 seriously on design and functionality. Very nice work IMHO.
author: adriano

comments.content: Beautiful! And that was the first time I saw Galaxie Polaris. Chester outdid himself on that one.
